name: Aged Treasure Map
prompt:
# TTRPG Asset Generation Prompt

## Core Structure
[Asset Type: handout]
[Game System: D&D 5e]
[Intended Use: VTT and Print reference]

## Detailed Description
Subject: In-world document â€” Aged Treasure Map
Environment: creased parchment, water damage, ink bleed, readable serif fonts; clear headings; no gibberish
Style: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), unified painterly collection style, grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, high-res scan aesthetics
Technical Requirements: aspect 1:1, resolution 1024x1024
Palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights


## Visual Specifications
- Lighting: studio
- Detail Level: high detail for zoom, simplified for overview
- Composition: rule of thirds with clear focal points and visual flow

## Practical Considerations
- Must be readable at intended viewing size
- Text must be legible and non-gibberish. Favor simple, readable serif fonts, larger kerning, and clear headings. If uncertain, use short Latin-like placeholder words with proper spacing, or leave blank lines for later typesetting.
- Avoid embedded text unless specified; prefer iconography and numbered pins

## Negatives
- nonsense text, watermarks, captions, signatures, artist names; modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare; overly sexualized or glamorized portrayal

Think deeply about creating an asset that enhances gameplay immersion while maintaining practical usability for TTRPG sessions.
alt_text: Aged Treasure Map as an in-world paper prop.
